title: AI Listing Photos Masterclass — Virtual Staging That Actually Sells
description: Deep dive into the latest AI virtual staging tools and how top-producing agents are using them to sell homes 40% faster. We cover room-by-room techniques, pricing strategies, and the tools that give you photorealistic results in under 60 seconds.

title: February 2026 Market Update — Agent Briefing
description: Weekly market analysis covering inventory trends, interest rate forecasts, and emerging micro-markets in the DC Metro area. Plus: how AI-powered pricing tools are changing the comp analysis game.

title: ChatGPT Prompts That Close Deals — Live Workshop Replay
description: Dustin walks through his exact ChatGPT prompts for listing descriptions, buyer consultations, market reports, and social media content. Includes downloadable prompt templates and live Q&A with Inner Circle members.

title: From Solo Agent to $277M — How AI Scaled My Team
description: Dustin Fox shares the full story of how he leveraged AI tools to grow from a solo agent to leading a 36-person team doing $277 million in volume. Key inflection points, tools that mattered most, and the mistakes to avoid.

title: AI Lead Follow-Up That Converts — Systems & Scripts
description: Stop losing leads to slow follow-up. This session covers AI-powered lead nurture sequences, voice AI for instant callbacks, and the exact automation stack that helped the Fox Homes team achieve a 67% engagement rate.
